verbose_text: Fructose in P. putida is degraded by both pathways, the EMP and the ED pathway [XREF_BIBR], whereas glucose is degraded almost exclusively via the ED pathway in P. putida as the fructose-6-phosphate kinase, able to catalyze the conversion of fructose-6-phsophate to fructose-1,6-biphosphate and thereby making the connection to the EMP pathway, is missing [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Fructose in P. putida is degraded by both pathways, the EMP and the ED
